scripts.setup:zkey: snarkjs groth16 setup circuits/build/square.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_10.ptau circuits/build/square_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute circuits/build/square_0000.zkey circuits/build/square_final.zkey -e="contrib"
scripts.export:verifier: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier circuits/build/square_final.zkey contracts/Verifier.sol
scripts.e2e: npm run build:circuit && npm run setup:zkey && npm run export:verifier && npm run deploy:local
scripts.ci:docker: docker run --rm -v "$PWD:/work" -w /work node:18-bullseye bash -lc "npm ci && chmod +x ci/run_e2e.sh && ./ci/run_e2e.sh"
